Equipment Actions.Action 1: Fist, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 20 Bludgeoning
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Hoof, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 23 Bludgeoning, Can knock the target Prone
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Gore, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 45 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Goristro makes 3 attacks, two with its Fists and one with hits Hoof

Abilities.Ability 1: Charge, If the Goristro moves at least 15ft straight towards a target and then hits it with a Gore attack, the target takes an extra Average 38 Piercing Damage and can be knocked Prone or pushed away
Abilities.Ability 2: Labyrinthine Recall, The Goristro can perfectly recall any path it has traveled
Abilities.Ability 3: Magic Resistance, The Goristro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 4: Siege Monster, The Goristro deals double damage to objects and structures

Damage Resistances.Damage 4: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
